item.title: A Comprehensive Reading List for and by Designers - InVision Blog
item.description:
A Comprehensive Reading List for and by Designers - InVision Blog

Being big bibliophiles here at InVision, we asked some of our favorite designers to recommend the book that inspired them the most this past year. Check out the 90* most popular answers and the top designers who recommend them, plus 5 inspiring periodicals.

item.title: Video: What is service design?
item.description:
Video: What is service design?

Design Methods Step 1: Discover Step one in a four-part guide for anyone who wants to understand the methods designers use and try them out for themselves. Discover - keep your perspectives wide, allowing for a broad range of ideas and influences.

item.title: Designing the Organization from Service Design Perspective
item.description:
Designing the Organization from Service Design Perspective

Aesthetics and the Ideology of Service and Service Design The term "Service Design" is said to have been coined in early 1990s where educational program dedicated to Service Design firstly appeared in KÃ¶ln International School of Design. Later on in 2004 the Service Design Network was founded, and since then various discussions on Service Design have been conducted.

item.title: Reflecting on Service Experience Conference 2015
item.description:
Reflecting on Service Experience Conference 2015

Adaptive Path hosted their 3rd annual Service Experience Conference last week, November 16 and 17, here in the heart of San Francisco. It was amazing to see so many passionate people come together to talk about designing service experiences. We wanted to share with you some of our thoughts and take-aways from the conference.

item.title: 10 Key Design Trends For 2016 (And How To Make The Most Of Them)
item.description:
10 Key Design Trends For 2016 (And How To Make The Most Of Them)

Apps as we know them will disappear. Luxury will trickle down to the masses. VR will go mainstream. These are just a few of the major design and technology trends shaping the world in 2016. The trends we've identified focus on issues we-a firm with over 600 designers and developers-expect to tackle in the coming year.

item.title: Cooper + Studio Dental: Shining a Spotlight On Service Design
item.description:
Cooper + Studio Dental: Shining a Spotlight On Service Design

As part of our continuing mentorship program at Rock Health, Cooper teamed up with Studio Dental co-founders Dr. Sara Creighton and Lowell Caulder to help them disrupt the dental industry with their mobile dental service. The startup gained early support from a successful $40K Indiegogo campaign, and for Cooper, this project has been a great opportunity to demonstrate the value of service design.
